member.summary: Occurs when [save].

summary.p: Sets or gets the virtual path to the editor's directory. It is relative to the current page.

The base path can be also set in the Web.config file using the appSettings section. Just set the "FCKeditor:BasePath" for that. For example:
<configuration> <appSettings> <add key="FCKeditor:BasePath" value="/scripts/FCKeditor/" /> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.name: P:Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.MaskedComboBox.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets the input mask to use at run time.
member.returns: A representing the current mask. The default value is the empty string which allows any input.
member.exception: The string supplied to the property is not a valid mask. Invalid masks include masks containing non-printable characters.

member.name: P:Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.MaskedComboBox.PromptChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to represent the absence of user input in .
member.returns: The character used to prompt the user for input. The default is an underscore (_).
member.exception: The prompt character specified is the same as the current password character, . The two are required to be different.
The character specified when setting this property is not a valid prompt character, as determined by the method of the class.

member.name: P:Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.MaskedComboBox.HidePromptOnLeave
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the prompt characters in the input mask are hidden when the masked text box loses focus.
member.returns: true if is hidden when does not have focus; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.

member.name: P:Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.MaskedComboBox.UseTextMaskFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use text mask format.
member.value: true if use text mask format; otherwise, false.
